text: Hey Leanne, I met up with my friend from Blue Zoo the other day and she was telling me about <https://animdojo.com/> which was set up by blue zoo as a great training programme for animators. Forgive me if you already know about this, thought I would pass it along , Emma

attachments.title: AnimDojo: The online animation gym.
attachments.text: An affordable of improving your CG character animation skills.
